column5: I'm looking through the December 2006 issue of "Indiana Game & Fish" on my lunch break, and I get to page 58-59.    I see a ad spread for Ontario, Canada. I'm looking through the ad and I see a picture of this kid holding a nice Smallmouth bass (in a mini-ad for www.sunsetcountry.net). I look closer, and go, "Hey, I recognize that hat....and the kid wearin' it!"    Sure enough, there's the President & CEO of Jumla Lures, Avery Quesnel....at least they know which male faces the Quesnel family to publish!   Sorry for the bad scan, but it's the best I could do late last night:       Congrats, Avery....and I'll drop the magazine in the mail tonight.  dk
Jumla fame is spreading far & wide
Wow... that picture must have come from out trip ot last year to eother Manotak Lodge or Shoal Lake Lodde... WO i really would like that magazine!!  Ill pm you my mailing address... thanks!!
To cool Dustin!  Good for you for sharing!  Whopper
just a "bump" since I added the picture  dk
Celebrity status.  Nice going.  Your famous in Indiana.
Very Cool, nice gesture Dustin!  Cheers, 1leg
Heres the original.. I cant wait to show Avery!!
The only reason Avery made the magazine is becasue he got his good looks from Monique  WTG Avery  Best regards, Sam
That's an awesome pic!! Thanks for sharing the story!
Great shot TJ!  Enjoy the Magazine...some pretty good articles in there too....if you're ever coming to Indiana....lol  dk
Congrats Avery. Folks better order their Jumlas before they're all gone. The kid will have his own fishing show in no time!!!
wtg Avery, you're becoming an international media sensation.  dk, I've been in Indiana once, visited Bloomington and fished Lake Monroe. Caught only one bass that day...  Mike
